metadata.title: CVE-2018-11219 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An Integer Overflow issue was discovered in the struct library in the Luasubsystem in Redis before 3.2.12, 4.x before 4.0.10, and 5.x before 5.0RC2, leading to a failure of bounds checking.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis - 5:4.0.9-1ubuntu0.1
redis-sentinel - 5:4.0.9-1ubuntu0.1
redis-server - 5:4.0.9-1ubuntu0.1
redis-tools - 5:4.0.9-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5:4.0.9-1ubuntu0.1').
